    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Calls the other constructor, sending 5 as the size.

      • Board

        public Board(int size)
        Sets up the ArrayList that represents the board. The indices of the ArrayList start at zero and go top to bottom. It is an ArrayList of int arrays, and the size of each array starts at one and increases by 1 for each subsequent row.
        Parameters:
        size - The amount of rows to have

    • Method Detail
